amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 116-411 to ensure the Administrator of TSA is in coordination with the Director of CDC and NIAID and shall ensure that TSA employees are provided the proper guidance regarding prevention and protections against coronavirus, including guidance and resources.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures the Administrator of TSA is in coordination with the Director of CDC and NIAID and shall ensure that TSA employees are provided the proper guidance regarding prevention and protections against coronavirus, including guidance and resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mucarsel-Powell amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 403 - 0 (Roll no. 88).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mucarsel-Powell amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 403 - 0 (Roll no. 88).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Mucarsel-Powell.
